pages.text: $(li)Cave centipedes are hostile, slow but strong creatures.$(br)$(li)If they bite you, you will be afflicted by a powerfull Posion II for a few seconds.$(br)$(li)Cave Centipedes target players and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alex_creatures/cockroaches)Cockroach$(/l).$(br)$(li)On death, Cave Centipedes can drop Cave Centipede Legs.
$(li)Cave Centipedes will not doubt to attack $(l:patchouli:creatures/alex_creatures/cockroaches)Cockroach$(/l) or you if you are near of them.
